block.enchantinginfuser.description.choo: Choose, modify and remove enchantments for your gear.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.enchanting: Place more bookshelves in a square around the infuser on up to two layers.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.unknown_en: This enchantment is too powerful for an infuser with such little enchanting power.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.lowPower1: Further increasing the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more enchanting power.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.lowPower2: Modifying the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more enchanting power.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.unknown_en: This enchantment is too powerful for an infuser with such little eterna.
Further increasing the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more eterna.
Modifying the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more eterna.
